ComicInfo.Summary: Michael heads to Philadelphia looking for the mysterious Order of the Cross. Unfortunately, the church thinks that Deathblow is the killer gunning for their promised child so Sister Mary attacks him when he arrives. Once things get straightened out, Deathblow has to rescue Mary and Christopher from the real killer, Trickle. Michael witnesses Christopher raise a boy from the dead.
